detail_desc: Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot and decorative bow at the top. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Short skirt in imitation leather with rows of fringing, a high waist and a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back. Unlined.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets, a low crotch and tapered legs with seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Off-the-shoulder top in sweatshirt fabric with long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in thin cotton jersey with ribbed cuffs.
Short, straight-cut dress in soft cotton jersey with a round, ribbed neckline, dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Gathered seams on the skirt to create soft draping.
Straw hat with a grosgrain band. Lined. Width of brim 4 cm.
Shorts in a cotton weave with a zip fly and button, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs to create a fitted silhouette.
Cargo joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and flap back and leg pockets with press-studs. Fake fly, shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Short skirt in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a high, ribbed waistband, and a slit at the back of the hem.
Sleeveless blouse in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a collar, concealed button placket, seam at the waist that is elasticated at the back, and a rounded hem.
Sleeveless playsuit in ribbed cotton jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated seam and drawstring at the waist and an overlocked frill trim at the hems.

Blouse in an airy viscose weave with broderie anglaise. Smocked stand-up collar, an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck, long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Hat in soft, rib-knit cotton with an appliqué on the turned-up hem.
Fitted, polo-neck top in soft viscose jersey.
Sandals with covered heels, a twisted detail at the front, an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle, and heel caps. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel approx. 8 cm.
Jumper in fine-knit cotton with buttons on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and v-cut at the front.
Sleeveless blouse in a viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Chest pocket, yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Longer shirt in a cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem.

Calf-length dress in a patterned weave. Square neckline with decorative gathers at the front and a concealed zip at the back. Short puff sleeves with smocked hems, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a slit at the front. Unlined.
Tunic in soft jersey made from a modal blend with short sleeves, a deep V-neck with decorative lacing at the back and a detachable tie belt under the bust.
Microfibre bra with a scalloped trim at the top and underwired padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Padded sleep bag in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and zip at one side. Jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.
NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Shorts in lightweight, printed cotton sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, an open back pocket and raw, roll-edge hems.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, gathers at the shoulders and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Two concealed buttons at the top, and a rounded hem.
High-waisted, 5-pocket trousers in stretch corduroy with a zip fly and button, and flared legs.
Twill cap with a small peak, decorative bow and covered elastication at the back. Lining in a cotton weave.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
All-in-one suit in soft velour made from an organic cotton blend. Press-studs down the front and along the legs, long sleeves with frill trims over the shoulders, and full feet.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Slim-fit trousers in stretch twill. High waist with adjustable elastication (in sizes 8-12Y), a zip fly and button, back pockets and narrow hems.
Ankle boots in grained imitation leather with covered heels, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and smooth soles. Heel 6.5 cm.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Wide, straight-cut trousers in glossy, patterned satin with a regular waist, concealed pockets in the side seams and fake welt back pockets. Legs with creases down the front, vertical seams down the back and slits at the hems.
Slim-fit, high-waisted jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with long raglan sleeves and a rounded, flounced hem. Longer at the back.
Blouse in an airy cotton weave with a boat neck, dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with elastication at the cuffs and a long tie belt at the waist.
Fully lined, patterned bikini. Top with a wide flounce at the top that continues over one shoulder and a narrow, adjustable shoulder strap over the other shoulder. Matching bikini bottoms.
Cargo trousers in stretch twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and flap leg pockets with concealed press-studs.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a ribbed polo neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Hair elastics without metal clips.
Short, fitted dress in soft jersey with mesh sections, a small stand-up collar and a small opening with buttons at the back of the neck. Long sleeves, and a double-layered lower section.
All-in-one suit in lightweight velour with appliqués, a hood and a zip with a chin guard at the front. Narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved bodysuit in soft organic cotton jersey with a rounded collar and press-studs at the back and crotch. Scalloped edges at the collar and cuffs.
Lightly padded, thermal jacket with a stand-up collar and detachable hood. Zip down the front, side pockets and two inner pockets. Reflective details. Lined.
Cap in woven fabric with a motif on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
5-pocket trousers in washed, slightly stretchy twill with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs. Skinny fit.
Pyjamas with a top and shorts in soft jersey made from a cotton blend. Top with a lace-trimmed V-neck, and short sleeves with overlocked edges. Shorts with an elasticated waist and overlocked hems.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey.
Scarf in a soft jacquard weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 68x180 cm.
Leggings in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist and fake front pockets. One pair with back pockets.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a cable-knit front, detachable tie belt under the bust and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in soft pile with a motif on the front, lined hood with ears and a wrapover front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Dungaree dress in soft, stretch organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket and adjustable straps with press-studs. Soft brushed inside.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high paper bag waist, side pockets, detachable tie belt and tapered legs.
5-pocket, low-rise jeans in washed stretch denim with slim legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
Long-sleeved top in patterned organic cotton jersey with a rounded collar and press-studs at the back.

Jacket in denim with imitation leather sleeves, a collar, buttons down the front and a zip at the cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets and an adjustable tab and buttons at the sides.
Relaxed-fit shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Suit waistcoat in woven fabric with lining fabric at the back. Buttons at the front, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and an adjustable tab at the back. Lined.
Pyjama bottoms in fleece with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with roll edges at the cuffs and hem and a small fabric appliqué at the bottom.
Sandals in imitation leather with tassels and decorative appliqués in the shape of a watermelon. Strap with a hook and loop fastening, and rubber soles.
Long wrap dress in jersey crêpe with a V-neck, long sleeves and narrow ties that fasten around the waist.
Pyjamas in a cotton weave. V-neck shirt with a collar, gathered shoulder seams and long, cuffed sleeves. Shorts with an elasticated waist.

Long, wide, V-neck dress in a patterned weave with wide balloon sleeves and double-layered, buttoned cuffs. Discreet pockets in the side seams, a wide, detachable belt at the waist and a slit at the front.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck tops in organic cotton jersey.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with a low, V-shaped waist, lined gusset, lace trims and cutaway coverage at the back.
Fitted coat in a soft, felted wool blend with notch lapels and concealed press-studs down the front. Detachable tie belt at the waist, pockets in the side seams and a single back vent. Lined.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot and loop at the back. Satin linings and insoles and rubber soles. (Sizes 0-1 have soft soles.)
Windbreaker in a nylon weave with a lined, drawstring hood and a zip down the front. Side pockets, an inner pocket and elasticated cuffs. Lined.
Blouse in a textured cotton weave containing glittery threads with a grandad collar and buttons down the front. Chest pockets, long sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elastication around the top.

Sleeveless blouse in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck with ties at the top. Buttons down the front, smocking and gathers at the shoulders and an elasticated seam at the back of the waist.
Oversized top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Cardigan in a soft, chunky knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
